net.codemusic.smartears
Interface IController

All Known Implementing Classes:
SmartEars
public interface IController

This is the interface that is used to provide access to the main objects in the system and to connect the GUI classes to the classes that model the sysetm. It contains get accessor methods that are self explainatory.
